frontmatter.title: The second biggest park in Barcelona

node.excerpt: A long while ago I bought a book called 111 Please In Barcelona That You Mush Not Miss and decided to take the challenge to see all these places. Especially during these times when we are not allowed to travel outside of Barcelona, it seems the perfect thing to do. Last night I picked no.78 Parc Central de Nou Barris. The park is located quite far…

One Saturday I was trying to get a coffee at Granja Petitbo in Barcelona. I read on a blog that it's a really good brunch place. Happily, it was full so I went across the street to this nice and cozy place called Cafe Búho. I got a coffee, did some reading and writing. It was perfect. When I got up and said I'd like to pay I've got this reply…
